formattedAddress: 42 Lafayette St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 42 Lafayette St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: It’s very hard to find a good dentist in NYC, you don’t really know what you’re walking into. I don’t normally leave reviews but in this case I needed to. Sound Dental is above and beyond. From a beautiful office to the top of the line gear, not to mention an amazing dentist who takes amazing care of you. If you have any dental needs, give this place a go and you won’t be disappointed. Dr. Shahabi is the best!

text.text: It’s very hard to find a good dentist in NYC, you don’t really know what you’re walking into. I don’t normally leave reviews but in this case I needed to. Sound Dental is above and beyond. From a beautiful office to the top of the line gear, not to mention an amazing dentist who takes amazing care of you. If you have any dental needs, give this place a go and you won’t be disappointed. Dr. Shahabi is the best!

originalText.text: I went to Dr. Shahabi for a second opinion on dental work I was told I needed (he came highly recommended from a friend). He was so thorough in explaining each procedure and transparently weighed out the necessity of each. I instantly trusted him so much more than my previous dentist. He was very honest, and very considerate about creating a dental plan that worked for my budget/insurance. Will be saving a few thousand and a few teeth thanks to him!

text.text: I went to Dr. Shahabi for a second opinion on dental work I was told I needed (he came highly recommended from a friend). He was so thorough in explaining each procedure and transparently weighed out the necessity of each. I instantly trusted him so much more than my previous dentist. originalText.text: Dr. Shahabi might be one of the best and by far coolest dentists I’ve encountered . He diagnosed a problem that has left my teeth massively damaged up to now that hadn’t been diagnosed all these years by many other dentists. He reversed it and finally I have confidence again with my teeth . He is a music lover and you will enjoy the chill vibes and energy. Sound dental will change how you think of going to the dentist .  Impeccable office and you can have confidence.

text.text: Dr. Shahabi might be one of the best and by far coolest dentists I’ve encountered . He diagnosed a problem that has left my teeth massively damaged up to now that hadn’t been diagnosed all these years by many other dentists. He reversed it and finally I have confidence again with my teeth . He is a music lover and you will enjoy the chill vibes and energy. Sound dental will change how you think of going to the dentist .  Impeccable office and you can have confidence.

originalText.text: Dr. Shahabi is gentle , welcoming and his office is beautiful! He listened to my concerns and answered all my questions. When being treated by a dentist I want a thorough exam and a gentle cleaning. The service was exceptional, when it came to the insurance process it was seamless. Everything was disclosed upfront the staff checked my plan prior to my visit which is always a plus! Insurance can be a foreign language sometime and when the office staff makes it simple to understand it’s a win win. Thank you for a great visit and an awesome experience!  Oh by the way I listened to my favorite artist while my pearly whites were getting shined!

originalText.text:
Absolutely great experience with Dr. Shahabi - very clean and modern clinic, we were in and out efficiently.

Had a hard time finding a dentist I trusted/liked in NYC so happy I was introduced to him.
